http

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • http.Request

  • public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single request to the server

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Request.BodyResult
      A helper enum to indicate the result of reading the request's body

      • parseHeaders

        private boolean parseHeaders()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads all request headers and stores them in the headers map
        Returns:
        If all headers were well formed and successfully read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • parseBody

        private Request.BodyResult parseBody()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the request body, if any, obeying the Content-Length header. If not present, it will read until the end of the stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
